titleStmt.title: Supplications of saints A booke of prayers: diuided into three parts.1. Daniels deuotion. 2. Paul, and his company. 3. David alone. prayers for seuerall dayes. seueral occasions. seuerall parties. Wherein are three most excellent prayers made by the late famous Queene Elizabeth.
titleStmt.author: Sorocold, Thomas, 1561-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Thomas Snodham] for Nicholas Bourne, and are to sould at his shop at the entring in of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: On title page, there are brace brackets around "1. Daniels .. alone" and "Seuerall .. partes".
In three parts, each with separate title page.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the entring in of the Royall Exchange
